title: Prediction Market 'Zeitgeist' to Use CoinDesk Indices for Broad Crypto Bets
description: Traders will be able to bet on the performance of a basket of DeFi tokens, or of a group of smart contract platforms' native currencies.

title: Singapore Police Responding to Su Zhu's Arrest Says It Has Detained 36-Year Old Man: Reuters
description: Zhu was reportedly arrested last week while trying to leave the country, liquidators said.

title: Tokenized Traditional Assets, Not Crypto, Are J.P. Morgan Clients’ Main Concern
description: On Tuesday, Tyrone Lobban, Head of Blockchain Launch and Onyx Digital Assets at J.P. Morgan, spoke at CCData’s Digital Asset Summit (CCDAS) in London. title: Tackling Algorithmic Bias: IEEE P7003 Initiative Promotes Ethical AI Development
description: In today’s digital age, artificial intelligence (AI) plays an increasingly pivotal role in our daily lives, from personalized streaming recommendations to healthcare applications. However, this proliferation of AI concerns algorithmic bias—when AI systems produce prejudiced results due to underlying assumptions or imbalanced training data.  To tackle this issue head-on, the IEEE Standards Association (IEEE SA) ... Read more

title: AI and Emerging Tech Challenges Call for Collaborative Solutions
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) and emerging technologies have ushered in a new era, bringing unprecedented opportunities and challenges. In today’s rapidly evolving digital landscape, addressing these multifaceted challenges necessitates a collaborative effort spanning various sectors and calls for policy reforms while emphasizing global cooperation. The rapid advancement of technologies, particularly artificial intelligence, has introduced transformative possibilities ... Read more

title: Cryptocurrency Gold Rush: FTX Strikes $500 Million Jackpot with Anthropic Bet as Google Eyes $2 Billion Stake
description: Anthropic, an AI company that benefited from a $500 million FTX investment is of major interest to Google.  Elon Musk and other prominent finance figures push back on recent media coverage focused on Sam-Bankman-Fried.  According to new reports, Google has shown major interest in Anthropic, an AI safety and research company based in San Francisco. title: World Mobile and Adaptive Broadband Collaborate: Report
description:
World Mobile recently announced its “strategic partnership” with the internet service provider Adaptive Broadband, marking the establishment of the network’s services to the rural regions of the United States. According to a press release on the Businesswire, the alliance intends to integrate World Mobile’s decentralized Airnode infrastructure into the existing wireless ISP network of Adaptive […]

title: Are the Bitcoin and Ethereum Bottoms In? Investor Chris Burniske Says ‘Selling Exhaustion’ Is Near – Here’s Why
description:
A prominent digital asset venture capitalist believes that the bottom is likely forming for the top cryptos by market cap.
